overview: For 27 years, Teton Gravity Research has been searching for the right place with the right crew at the perfect time to experience life at its fullest.Â Between the thrill of the hunt and the peace of floating down a mountain, the sum of our experiences becoming greater than its parts is what we seek. If you ask us, our annual snow film Magic Hour is just that.
tagline: Magic Hour is not so much a particular time a day as a culmination of powerful moments in some of the most beautiful, wild places on the planet.
title: Magic Hour
